item.title: Buy the dip in this bank that should benefit from tariffs, says top analyst Mike Mayo
item.description: Analyst Mike Mayo said Citigroup is well positioned to navigate potential headwinds from the president's tariffs.

item.title: Netflix gets an upgrade from MoffettNathanson, which sees stock rising 20%
item.description: The firm upgraded the streaming giant to buy from neutral.

item.title: Here are Monday's biggest analyst calls of the day: Nvidia, Tesla, Apple, Nike, Micron, Netflix and more
item.description: Here are Monday's biggest calls on Wall Street.

item.title: Bitcoin proxy MicroStrategy is outperforming the crypto. How to profit if it reverts back
item.description: Michael Khouw analyzes Michael Saylor's company and gives an options strategy that wins if the stock falls from here.

item.title: JPMorgan upgrades this cruise stock, sees more than 55% upside ahead
item.description: The firm upgraded the cruise line operator to overweight from neutral.
